**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 32 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27 [Profane Ghoul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1958) **Source** [Shadows at Sundown](/Sources.aspx?ID=121) pg. 33 **Perception** +19; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +22, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +19, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +20 **Str** +3 **Dex** +6 **Con** +5 **Int** +3 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +5 --- **AC** 30 **Fort** +17 **Ref** +22 **Will** +19 **HP** 180 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) --- **Speed** 30 feet, burrow 10 feet **Melee** jaws +22 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 2d10+7 piercing plus 2d6 negative and profane paralysis and ghoul fever **Melee** claw +22 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 2d6+7 slashing plus 2d6 negative and profane paralysis **Ghoul Fever** ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 29; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1 day); **Stage 2** 2d6 negative damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day); **Stage 3** as stage 2 (1 day); **Stage 4** 2d6 negative damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day); **Stage 5** as stage 4 (1 day); **Stage 6** dead, and rises as a [ghoul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=218) the next midnight. **Profane Paralysis** ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) Any living, non-[elf](/Traits.aspx?ID=58) creature hit by the profane ghoul's attack must attempt a DC 29 Fortitude save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35).
**Failure** The creature is [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save. **Profane Whispers** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The ghoul whispers profane secrets of undeath. Living creatures within 10 feet of the ghoul take 2d8 [persistent mental damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). Those with ghoul fever must also succeed at a DC 29 Will save or have the disease advance one step. The profane ghoul can't use Profane Whispers again for 24 hours. **Scuttle** ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The profane ghoul crawls on all fours, moving up to half its Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.
name: Profane Ghoul
